body_html: @RicherMans Ideally, every Module should have a functional counterpart implementation. See for example the implementation for pixel shuffle in functional and the corresponding implementation as a module
body_text: @RicherMans Ideally, every Module should have a functional counterpart implementation. See for example the implementation for pixel shuffle in functional and the corresponding implementation as a module
body: @RicherMans Ideally, every `Module` should have a `functional` counterpart implementation. See for example the implementation for [pixel shuffle in functional](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/functional.py#L477-L505) and the [corresponding implementation as a module](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/pixelshuffle.py)
